useCase.name: Manage-Environments

preconditions.precondition: The operations manager needs to have authority to manage environments.

useCase.trigger: The operations manager requests to destroy an environment.

mainSequence.step: Operations Manager requests CLI to destroy environment with name c3.
CLI forwards the request to the system to destroy the environment with the specified name.
Operations Manager requests Web interface to destroy environment with name c3.
Web interface forwards the request to the system to destroy the environment with the specified name.
